Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Germany to win based on their current form.
Nagelsmann may be tempted to tinker with his selection in a few positions.
Whichever lineup that he selects should be strong enough to come out on top against a Greece side who have both lost and not scored in three of their last four away games.
Post-Match Reflections: Erik ten Hag praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Luka Modric hinted at retiring from international football after the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rain delayed the match by 30 minutes
This was Barcelona’s 100th El Clásico victory over Real Madrid
